overview.description: SALIX Life is a portable breathing technology company established in December 2024. Located on the 5th floor of Poscom Tower, 227 Sowon-ro, Deokyang-gu, Goyang-si, Gyeonggi-do, we provide "safe breathing that protects life" in various environments.
